New Episode of The East Wing with Steve & Sam

By Tim Smith · January 9th, 2013

Last week, I had the chance to sit down with Steve Derico and Sam Soffes. These two guys are behind one of my favorite podcasts: Refactor.Tv. In the episode we talk about a variety of things. It was really fun to record. It feels more like you get to listen in to one of our conversations more than an actual interview.

Interested in working with me?
